lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton’s remarks in Florida signaled the campaign’s direction in the homestretch: a barrage intended to disqualify Mr. Trump with brutal efficiency.

byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer reported from Dade City, and Yamiche Alcindor from King of Prussia, Pa., and Eau Claire, Wis.
byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and YAMICHE ALCINDOR

headline.print_headline: Clinton, Moving Past F.B.I. Review, Turns Focus to Attacks on Trump
headline.main: Hillary Clinton, Moving Past F.B.I. Review, Turns Focus to Attacks on Donald Trump

snippet: Mrs. Clinton’s remarks in Florida signaled the campaign’s direction in the homestretch: a barrage intended to disqualify Mr. Trump with brutal efficiency....
abstract: Hillary Clinton moves to turn voters' attention away from her recent conflicts with FBI and toward character and behavior of rival Donald J Trump as 2016 presidential race draws close to end.
